about_the_game:
Cubidle is an idle clicker game with various mechanics and gameplay possibilities. Destroy cubes to generate money, prestige and super points. Use each currency to buy upgrades, generators and other powerful features. Use all available resources to complete all difficulty tiers and collect all achievements.

GAMEPLAY

Click or use passive damage generators to achieve your goals. Complete levels, unlock new difficulty tiers, buy perks, prestige upgrades, evolve your generators and even unlock customization options.

UPGRADES

Upgrade each generator to maximize your damage. Buy powerful prestige upgrades which require game to be restarted. Unlock new perks and evolve generators.

PERKS

Buy various perks to unlock new income possibilities. Get a change to convert your damage into income with different conditions and bonuses.

INTEREST

Invest points to upgrade your stable passive income. Make a billion from one even without clicking or using generators. Perfect idle income wtih various upgrades.

CUSTOMIZATION

Not only light and dark themes are available. You can choose from eleven colors to customize anything you want. From cubes and generators to interface and scene color.

EVOLVING SYSTEM

Evolve your generators to break the limits and reach new heights. It requires a lot of resources, but it's worth it if you want to beat all challenges.

ACHIEVEMENTS AND RANKING

There are 100 achievements hidden in the game. Can you get them all? Also you can try yourself in a ranking competition against other players

PHYSICS AND GRAPHICS

Every cube destruction is pure physics-based fun. Also you can toggle on and off various visual effects, so you can focus on your own goals.
